name: The Lake (milessupshur)
description:
A young fisherman tries to uncover the secrets of a lake town and its missing people by fishing up the horrors that lie in its waters. Players must fight for their lives against the creatures that lie in the lake by fishing them out before they are pulled in. Multitask to survive in this horror fishing game!

Controls:

Space- Reel

Shift- Light lantern

Enter- Bucket water

Grader Mode: To progress through scenes, use the right arrow key.
